title: New Service Launched!
content: We have launched a new digital service for our users. Experience faster processing and better support for all your application needs.

title: Holiday Notice
content: Our office will be closed on 17th June due to a public holiday. We wish you a happy and safe holiday!

title: Important: Update Your Contact Details
content: Please log in to your account and update your contact information to ensure uninterrupted service notifications.
